item.title: Thirty-two Cubans killed during US attack on Venezuela
item.description: Cuba's president said military and intelligence operatives were providing protection to captured leader Nicol√°s Maduro.

item.title: 'We need Greenland': Trump repeats threat to annex Danish territory
item.description: The US president has repeatedly said he wants the island to become a part of the US.

item.title: Ten found guilty of cyber-bullying Brigitte Macron
item.description: A Paris court found them guilty of "malicious" bullying towards the wife of the French president.

item.title: South Korea's Lee Jae Myung meets China's Xi as he seeks to reset ties
item.description: Trade, regional security and Beijing's unofficial ban on Korean pop culture are on the agenda.

item.title: Bluefin tuna fetches record $3.2m at Tokyo auction
item.description: The 243kg fish went to a man known as the Tuna King, who said "the year's first tuna brings good luck".
